definition: A small accumulation of liquid on a surface, typically formed after rainfall or due to a spillage, often found on roads, sidewalks, or in natural depressions. It is commonly encountered outdoors and can be an obstacle to pedestrians or vehicles.

examples.german: Pass auf, da ist eine Pfütze!
Die Kinder springen in die Pfützen.
examples.english: The children are jumping in the puddles.
The puddle is full of mud.

examples.german: Die Pfütze ist nach dem Regen entstanden.
examples.english: The puddle formed after the rain.
